author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:

After phase-2 upgrade HB now has four depths from 1 to 4, this causes HB and HO overlapping with each other in some ieta-iphi region of the DQM depth plots since HO was originally assigned to depth 4. This pull request creates a separate new plot for HO depth in each depth related quantities with plot name depthHO.  

Expected change: new plots with name depthHO appear in every depth folder of Hcal DQM.
title: HcalDQM - Separating HO and HB in depth plots
